titleNullable: LLM Comparative Performance Fake News Detection_v1
descriptionNullable:
This dataset is the performance data of the paper "News Verifiers Showdown: A Comparative Performance Evaluation of ChatGPT 3.5, ChatGPT 4.0, Bing AI, and Bard in News Fact-Checking".

It includes:
A. The questions injected to the LLMs for testing
B. The answer-key (legitimacy) associated with each test item
C. The individual response of each LLM per item
